results.title: Truman and the Cold War
results.brief_description: Provides a background to the development of the Cold War. Includes graphic footage of the plight of refugees in post-war Europe; notes the Truman doctrine of giving aid to free nations threatened by aggression, by providing a case study of Greece where partisans supported by communists strove to get rid of the monarchy; the Marshall Aid Program; the Berlin Blockade and the consequent formation of NATO. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Truly, madly, deeply. (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Robert Cooper, BBC Film Unit and Anthony Minghella
results.brief_description: Acclaimed British actors Juliet Stevenson and Alan Rickman star in this wonderfully moving story of love, loss and letting go. Nina lives in her rat-infested flat where she spends most of her time grieving for her dead lover Jamie. As if in answer to her dreams, jamie re-enters her life but Nina discovers that living in the past could mean a life without a future.

Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
